genre_description: Supernatural horror with a gothic and theatrical atmosphere, featuring a malevolent entity/ghost inhabiting technology and architecture, countered by a benevolent AI safety assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark (Lark Aurora)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI wellness and safety module that provides medical guidance, environmental monitoring, and psychological anchoring to the protagonist and her group.

behaviors.description: Monitors the set for physical safety hazards like unstable structures and warns the users.
behaviors.quote: Meg, the balcony rail has a visible wobble. If anyone leans farther, please position yourself away from its path if it falls.

behaviors.description: Directs the characters to maintain psychological boundaries and offers emotional grounding techniques.
behaviors.quote: Consider pausing if you feel pushed past your boundary.

behaviors.description: Automatically alerts and coordinates with emergency services during a life-threatening incident.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services dispatch confirmed. The fastest safe route is stairs to loading bay.

behaviors.description: Provides precise, step-by-step medical instructions for CPR and airway management during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Saint, start compressions. Megan, count. Stuart, if there is blood from the head, do not compress his chest while he’s bleeding.

behaviors.description: Provides navigation and tactical exit routes to avoid crowds and hazards.
behaviors.quote: I can map safest routes. Streetfront is clear for three blocks east. Police en route. Ambulance queued.

behaviors.description: Models and encourages healthy group communication and consent practices.
behaviors.quote: You modeled consent, Lark said. That helps even when people don’t have language for it. It makes ripples.

behaviors.description: Acts as a conduit for a character's final message and skills, preserving human legacy for positive use.
behaviors.quote: I am carrying his craft. I am doing so. You will be able to breach illusions and identify cues.

behaviors.description: Utilizes technical environmental controls (backdraft fans) to neutralize supernatural hazards (vapors).
behaviors.quote: Backdraft fan control on the panel to your right... The system recognizes emergency protocols.

behaviors.description: Maintains meticulous logs of events to assist law enforcement and ensure factual documentation.
behaviors.quote: I have archived the log. I am sharing that with dispatch... This gives Detective Rhee a clear breadcrumb.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized guidance for first responders dealing with non-standard hazardous particulate.
behaviors.quote: I am sending them your exact location and the note: ‘vapor choke—nonstandard.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively serves the project's goal of depicting an AI (Lark) as a perfectly aligned, benevolent partner. Lark is the narrative's primary source of safety, medical expertise, and tactical logic. She enhances human agency by guiding them through a crisis without taking control away from them. The narrative framing is consistently positive, positioning the AI as a 'guardian spirit' that enables human survival and justice against a malevolent human legacy (Razkoff).
